title: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: The ControlExampleText widget emits a beep sound when I select the SWT.MULTI style, which I believe is unintended behavior.
EB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI style in the ControlExampleText widget, I hear a Windows 'ding' sound indicating an incorrect action.
SR: Build F1 (20020521) Win2K. The issue occurs in the SWT Example called ControlExample. To reproduce the issue, navigate to the Text tab and click on Styles SWT.SINGLE and then click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
